hint.en: Transition time between brightnesses in 100ms steps (ex: a value of 4 means 400ms, a value of 10 would be 1 second).

There are two different options available to control the color of a light. By default hs (hue amd saturation) is used. Using this setting you can use xy (CIELAB) instead. Only use this if you know what you're doing!
